summary: UPPER AND LOWER CONTROL ARMS (ALL 4) FOR THE FRONT SUSPENSION HAVE FAILED AND MUST BE REPLACE AGAIN.  SQUEEZING/CRUNCHING NOISE AT LOW SPEED AND OVER BUMPS.  HAVE BEEN REPLACED- LESS THAN 15K MILES AGO BY AUDI DEALER AND THEY'VE WORN OUT ALREADY.  THIS IS A POOR DESIGN AND AUDI NEEDS TO COME THROUGH WITH A SOLUTION FOR ITS CUSTOMERS.  THIS IS A SEVERAL THOUSAND DOLLAR REPAIR JOB!    *NLM
